text: Radzyń Podlaski is a town in Lublin Voivodeship in southeastern Poland. It is about 60 km north of Lublin. About 15,000 people live there. Its area is 19.31 km². It has had town rights since 1468. Its famous landmark is the Potocki Palace. == Other websites == * Official town website Category:Towns in Lublin Voivodeship
title: Radzyń Podlaski
